Package com.ktzvhad.rents.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.ktzvhad.rents.controller.AdminController
@Controller public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class handles various administration-related operations. It includes functionality for managing users, roles, permissions, and donations.

Permissions:

  • ADMIN: Can view and manage users.
  • SUPERUSER: Can manage roles and register new users.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsersWithApiData

      @GetMapping("/admin/users/clients") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllUsersWithApiData()
      Get all users along with their associated API data by clientId.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of users and their API data.

      Permissions:

      • ADMIN
      • SUPERUSER

    • getCurrentUserPermissions

      @GetMapping("/user/permissions") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCurrentUserPermissions(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Get current user's permissions and roles.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing user details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user's roles.

      Permissions:

      • USER
      • ADMIN
      • SUPERUSER

    • getUserData

      @GetMapping("/user/data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserData(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Get specific user's data based on their username.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's username.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user's data.

      Permissions:

      • USER (only sees their own data)

    • getUserDonations

      @GetMapping("/donations/user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserDonations(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Get donation data for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's username.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user's donation data.

      Permissions:

      • USER

    • registerNewUser

      @PostMapping("/admin/register") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> registerNewUser(@RequestBody RegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Register a new user.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - the registration request containing user details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the registration.

      Permissions:

      • SUPERUSER

    • getAllRoles

      @GetMapping("/admin/roles") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Role>> getAllRoles()
      Get all available roles in the system.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of all roles.

      Permissions:

      • ADMIN
      • SUPERUSER

    • assignRoles

      @PostMapping("/admin/assignRoles") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> assignRoles(@RequestBody RoleAssignmentRequest request)
      Assign roles to a user.
      Parameters:
      request - the role assignment request containing userId and role names.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the role assignment.

      Permissions:

      • SUPERUSER

    • getCurrentUserInfo

      @GetMapping("/user/info") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCurrentUserInfo(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Get the current authenticated user's information.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's username.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user's information including API keys.

      Permissions:

      • USER
